channel.title: EruptionX 317 RSPS (no claws and other crap)
channel.description: [center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/j673v9.png[/img] Awesome 317 RSPS with old graphics, 100% castle wars, 100% treasure trails, quests and more! [size=36pt][url=http://eruption-x.no-ip.biz/webclient.html]Click here to play[/url][/size] [size=18pt][url=http://eruption-x.org]Eruption-X.org[/url][/size] [youtube]http://youtu.be/QvhkMYLFq14[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/W0jFWxA9rWM[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/SRg9al3OEIY[/youtube] [size=18pt]Screenshots[/size] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/5zmcts.png[/img] 2007 runescape npcs [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/15fm2ja.png[/img] 100% Castle wars [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/r0v5gx.png[/img] Perfect oldschool pk [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/dw9f9w.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/15dp18l.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/29kt3s3.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2bv6gj.png[/img] 100% bosses [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2afllj9.png[/img] Multiple skilling places [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/28hlpia.png[/img] Friendly community [/center]

item.title: EruptionX 317 RSPS (no claws and other crap)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well, I think the server looks decent, whether a server was leeched or not, it shouldn’t matter at this point, I don’t believe there are MANY servers out there that aren’t leeched, so shut up?

Anyway, from the media (not looking at videos), it looks decent, I’m tempted to give it a try.

Oh and I see that the owner is childish, but I won’t stop let that stop me from getting online, however, he should learn to grow-up; this is in the ‘new and announcements’ board: http://puu.sh/URx1

Read full topic

item.title: EruptionX 317 RSPS (no claws and other crap)
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“Pink Phat, post:59, topic:449093”]I can’t really understand you, but it seems your saying that hard means to take a long time.

Sure, hard things can take a long time, but that doesn’t make it the meaning.[/quote]
You’re right about that.

Too say it simple, i just mean that time also has something to do with calling it hard.
Not only coding, even time makes it hard.

Read full topic
item.source: EruptionX 317 RSPS (no claws and other crap)

item.title: EruptionX 317 RSPS (no claws and other crap)
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“Pink Phat, post:32, topic:449079”][quote author=antirock75 link=topic=551976.msg4074516#msg4074516 date=1344668212]

Nope, you’re just an idiot.

Just because nobody has done it doesn’t mean it’s hard.

We’ve got construction on a 317 on my server, nobody has done it, does that make it hard? Idk, it’s an opinion, jackass. I don’t see this server getting anywhere just because you have ‘247 clue scrolls’ or whatever.
[/quote]Wow… My server isn’t finished yet. I don’t care how far it goes, I’m having fun coding.
Your server is 459 and yes, if your construction is 100% then it’s hard to code. By hard I mean it takes a lot of time.

Gosh man, I’d like to see what you would do if 5 people would come and call you a leecher. You would start screaming about your construction, believe me.

I’m not trying to say how cool I am, idiots. I’m trying to say that I’m not a leecher. Can you guys fuck off now?

Since when does hard mean it takes a long time? The word your looking for is time consuming. Gosh[/quote]
Pinkphat.

He says, it is hard with a different revision.
And saying it’s hard because it takes time, if you have another revision but u did it in 3 minutes.
Then you can’t really call it: hard.
Even time counts.

So, in my opinion if u do something hard maybe with a different revision and, it it’s time consuming.
Then you could call it hard.

Read full topic
item.source: EruptionX 317 RSPS (no claws and other crap)

Gosh man, I’d like to see what you would do if 5 people would come and call you a leecher. You would start screaming about your construction, believe me.

I’m not trying to say how cool I am, idiots. I’m trying to say that I’m not a leecher. Can you guys fuck off now?[/quote]

I hope some of you, will check out the server.

item.title: EruptionX 317 RSPS (no claws and other crap)
item.dc:creator: @antirock75 antirock75
item.description:
@antirock75 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:47, topic:449093”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=551976.msg4074045#msg4074045 date=1344631445]

I can tell this is leeched because this isn’t even a 474. Only an idiot would say so.

  • yes, doors have been released, lmfao.
    [/quote]Omg dude read my posts. I know it’s a 317, just saying it’s a 474 because people come and whine about bandos and stuff. And I’m making a code that opens ALL doors. You don’t need to add every door.

dear God your using sagi? … that has to have the largest memory leak I believe I have ever seen in it.

I fixed it so no worries.

Been released…

This
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,525800.0.html[/quote]In my system you don’t have to manually add doors…
So yeah…
EDIT: Lmao, and my code is 50 times more compact.
All I have to do is add ,for example, 1530,1531 and it opens all doors with id 1530. Just like real rs. I have all objects server sided.
Btw send me a source with 257 different clue scrolls.

Read full topic
